title: Episode 826 - To Catch a Predator's Chris Hansen
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by ‘To Catch a Predator’ host Chris Hansen to discuss the history of the show, what he knows about the Jeffrey Epstein case and his own investigations into the billionaire sex trafficker, bias and profit motive ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by ‘To Catch a Predator’ host Chris Hansen to discuss the history of the show, what he knows about the Jeffrey Epstein case and his own investigations into the billionaire sex trafficker, bias and profit motive in the media and how that can be fixed (if it can), and his new podcasts ‘Have a Seat with Chris Hansen’ and ‘Predators I’ve Caught’.
